text: 2:3 Josua 1:7; 1 Eghaghaniba 22:12-13Nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨn God nɨ mɨkemezir biziba nɨ dar amu. Egh nɨ tuavir aghuir an e bagha inabazibar gɨn mangɨ, egh arazir a ifongeziba, ko an Akar Gavgaviba, ko bizir a damuasa e mɨkemeziba, ko a mɨgeir akaba, nɨ bar dar gɨn mangɨ. Kamaghɨn God nɨn akuraghtɨ, danganir manam nɨ an iti, nɨn ingangarim bar deraghvɨram otivam.
